WHAT_IS_DESCRIPTION: The University offers all the digital and content creation tools that teachers and students need to create a more intuitive and connected learning experience.
FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_1: Keeps a chronological record of the activities carried out in the virtual classroom.
FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_2: Keeps a chronological record of the activities carried out in the virtual classroom.
FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_3: It is a place where conversations take place. Students and teachers can follow relevant discussions on favorite subjects.
FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_4: Students from Escola da Inteligência can follow all classes and courses in an immersive learning experience.
FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_5: Teachers and students participate in remote classes live by transmitting audio, video and text.
FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_6: Platform for video sharing. Teachers and students can store and share videos within the virtual classroom.
MAIN_SUBTITLE: Anyone can create their own university and start sharing organized knowledge. Create your community to start discussions, create courses, upload videos and manage your student list.
TIAGO_DESCRIPTION: Tiago Camilo is a Brazilian judoka, world champion, Olympic runner-up and three-time Pan American champion in the middle, welterweight and lightweight categories.
BLOCKCHAIN_DESCRIPTION: Educational project focused on the development and formation of an innovative ecosystem of entrepreneurs, new business models and initiatives using Blockchain infrastructures and DLTs.
ESCOLA_DESCRIPTION: Escola da Inteligência is an educational program that aims to develop socio-emotional education in the school environment. Based on the Theory of Multifocal Intelligence, elaborated by Dr. Augusto Cury.
ADD_TIMELINE_ERROR_LESS_CHARACTER: Message must be more than two characters.
ADD_TIMELINE_MESSAGE_ERROR: Adding timeline message fail. Please try again.
TIMELINE_GET_ERROR: Fetching timeline failed. Please try again
COURSE_BYCOMPLETING: By completing all courses and the practical project, you will receive a Certification that you can share with potential employers and your professional network.
COURSE_VIEW_CONTENT_AGAIN: The content can be reviewed by clicking on the Course Modules menu.
ABOUT_VALUE_SUB: New ways to educate, re-educate, train and retrain
ABOUT_OUR_FOCUS_SUB: The only way to end the perpetuation of poverty and ignorance in our Brazil
ABOUT_PRODUCT_SUB: We develop Office for education (SAAS) in a Social-Marketplace for students, independent educators, companies and educational institutions.
ABOUT_VIRTUAL_REALITY_SUB1: With this initiative, we are giving our students the opportunity to be part of this technological revolution
ABOUT_VIRTUAL_REALITY_SUB2: The combination of virtual reality and distance learning will help students to use technology to its full potential, while encouraging self-learning in an even more flexible and independent environment
ABOUT_LEADERSHIP_MP: Marcelo Pio is a self-taught engineer who has been coding commercial applications since the age of 11. Raised in a family of entrepreneurs, he executed multiple successful projects in Brazil and moved to California to study Computer Science. Extensive operating and engineering experience working as entrepreneur, software engineer and consultant on start-ups in different industries (gaming, gambling, education, communications, retail), medium-size business as Petcare (veterinary hospital) and large-size business as Jovem Pan (largest radio station in South America).
ABOUT_LEADERSHIP_RL: Mr. Rodrigo Lara is an entrepreneur with extensive operational and financial experience. He is the founder and CEO of NOVOCIM, a new cement player in Brazil, having raised capital and managed the entire process of licensing, financing, hiring people and managing the company. The experience includes Sales and Operations, Project Management, M&A, Strategy, Venture Capital and Private Equity. He has extensive experience in mergers and acquisitions in investment banks and in-depth knowledge of the private equity sector, having worked with Goldman Sachs, JPMorgan Chase and Banco Patrimonio, and with Patria Private Equity and Goldman Sachs' proprietary investment area (PIA) in Silicon Valley. He is a professor of finance, innovation, venture capital and entrepreneurship. Mr. Lara has a bachelor's degree in Business Administration from EAESP-FGV and a master's degree in BusinessAdministration from Harvard Business School.
ABOUT_DIRECTOR_SUB: Entrepreneur and educator delighted with people, innovation and technology, involved in the process of educational transformation and teacher training, professor in the fields of engineering and business management, master in artificial intelligence, specialized in the areas of management and education in institutions such as Harvard, PUC , Tampere University (Finland), Kaospilot / Manifesto 55, Crescimentum, etc. Experience in educational management, training of professionals, distance and hybrid teaching, creation of games, educational solutions with the application of methodologies, technologies and creative use of spaces. 19 years working as an educational manager of MBAs, undergraduate and graduate courses, education and training programs in classroom, hybrid and online. 5 years of experience as a distance education coordinator in higher education institutions. 15 years of experience in higher education. 10 years planning and developing solutions and sales channels for the areas of information technology, electrical engineering and control and automation. Three years of experience working as an application engineer in the areas of automation and electrical engineering.
